Rulings.Edison:
●This card does not target.
●If your Elemental Hero monster is in Defense Position, calculate damage as normal, using its DEF.
●If you activate Mirror Gate, Damage Calculation is resolved as part of the resolution of Mirror Gate's effect. You can't activate cards or effects that could usually be activated during the Damage Step.
●If the attacking monster or the attack target is removed from the field by an effect chained to Mirror Gate, Mirror Gate resolves without effect.

Rulings.Base:
1. This card does not target.
2. If your 'Elemental HERO' monster is in Defense Position, calculate damage as normal, using its DEF.
3. If you activate "Mirror Gate", Damage Calculation is resolved as part of the resolution of the effect of "Mirror Gate". You cannot activate cards or effects that could usually be activated during the Damage Step.
4. If the attacking monster or the attack target is removed from the field by an effect chained to "Mirror Gate", "Mirror Gate" resolves without effect.
5. [FORUM] The monster that was attacking before "Mirror Gate" was activated is still the attacking monster after "Mirror Gate" resolves.

EXAMPLE: If your opponent declares an attack against your Elemental HERO monster while "Skyscraper" is on the field, "Mirror Gate" will not make your "Elemental HERO" monster the attacking monster and have it gain an ATK boost from "Skyscraper".
